Text.Page:
We've got a target of opportunity in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}. I want you to move on it.

Meet with {@LinkCreature:418#2003#Arigma}. He'll know the target's current location.

There are two argon commanders down here. They're cautious, but predictable.

If you can take out one of the commanders, it should throw the argons off balance and let us seize the initiative.

Good luck. We're all counting on you.

Oh, I wish I could've seen that. A kill like that isn't something you forget.

Great work, . The Shariar will sing songs of this day. Loud, drunken songs.
